name: DARIA Case Manager
description: A Rails-based case management system for abortion funds

CM_RESOURCES_URL.description: usually a link to the google drive folder with CM resources in it

DARIA_FUND_FULL.description: full fund name. e.g. DC Abortion Fund

DARIA_FUND_PHONE.description: Your fund's hotline number, for display in the footer. e.g. 202-452-7464

DARIA_FAX_SERVICE.description: URL of your fax service, for display in the footer. e.g. www.efax.com

DARIA_GOOGLE_KEY.description: from google cloud account for oauth/sign on

DARIA_GOOGLE_SECRET.description: from google cloud account for oauth/sign on

GOOGLE_GEO_API_KEY.description: from google cloud account, specific to the geography API

FUND_MAILER_DOMAIN.description: domain you want emails to come from. Should be your fund's domain. e.g. dcabortionfund.org

DARIA_LINES.description: Lines to divide calls into, separated by commas. If one line, just put Main

DARIA_PLEDGE_GENERATOR_DISABLED.description: The PDF Pledge generator only works for DCAF for now

SITE_URL.description: The app name you just selected plus .herokuapp.com . e.g. myfund.herokuapp.com
